revised_title: A New Method for Measuring and Examining Suspended Impurities in the Air
tldr: The authors present a new method for trapping and examining suspended impurities in the air, focusing on the relationship between dust and visibility. They describe various methods of measuring suspended impurities and discuss the limitations of each. The authors' method involves using a high-velocity air jet to collect dust particles on a glass surface, allowing for microscopic examination and instant measurement of impurities. This method provides a more accurate representation of the suspended impurities in the air compared to other methods.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Atmospheric Science
